1.0.name: wordpress/front-page-excluded-categories
1.0.description: A basic plugin that excludes posts in one or more categories from appearing on the front page. This is especially useful if you use an automated posting system, like the del.icio.us bookmark blog posting feature, that updates your blog regularly. In such a case, you can assign these posts to an excluded category so they don't appear on the front page, but do appear in a category page.
